"Gathering":
"In the field, you can use Gathering to acquire \"Gathering Materials\" like fruits and vegetables.

You can acquire meat from the passive \"Tames\" creatures.
When you attack Tames, they either run away or all attack you at once. Try to defeat them before they escape."
"The Gathering Materials you collect can be turned into \"Quick Food\", which boosts your abilities temporarily, at the Food Stand or any Ryuker Device."
